original_title: Kevin Bridges: The Story So Far Live in Glasgow
overview: Star of TVs Live at the Apollo & Michael McIntyre's Comedy Roadshow, Kevin Bridges is the next big thing in comedy and the one to watch in 2010. His unique brand of social commentary, astute observations and sharp one-liners arguably make him the hottest act to come out of Scotland in the last ten years.
tagline: Master of Stand Up at just 22. This is unmissable stuff!
title: Kevin Bridges: The Story So Far Live in Glasgow
